name: 99 Miles Runner: A Soul's Journey To Eternity
name_original: 99 Miles Runner: A Soul's Journey To Eternity
description:
Dodge through and overcome all the obstacles in your path.  You have to run like a storm to save your life and still the survival inside this world is at stake. You are fleeting from your grumpy sins, so you have to make use of all the opportunities to get away from the daring enemies. If not, you might fall inside a limbo. Dash faster into your eternal life by avoiding death traps, unlock new locations and collect energy dots to make it to the other end. If you get stuck in in the game you can upgrade powers from the store.  Focus on the adventure and let nothing to stop you from reaching your ultimate destiny. 

Test your reflexes when you escape! Dodge the obstacles, collect bonuses, earn points and even use those points to upgrade your powers. Get the fun of the exhilarating running, jumping and sliding that you love the most! Navigate perilous mountains, farmlands, cliffs, rocky caves, woods, graveyards, falling bridges etc with the cursed soul of yours. How far can you run?

99 Miles is a 2D Side-Scrolling Platform Runner Adventure game where you'll be playing as a soul who is separated from his body and is lost. Your aim is to overcome the obstacles at different lands to help the soul to reach his ultimate destiny. As you move forward the path gets harder and the energy dots are the only thing that can keep you alive. Collect energy dots and avoid obstacles to save the soul from draining health. Energy Dots are not only the source of your energy but also a source of your valuable points.

The power-ups that you collect inside the game gives you special powers. Don't miss them, sometimes they might be the only option you have to make it to the end. With the Energy Points you have collected, you can buy these power-ups from the store. You can also upgrade the duration of the boosts. With-out upgrading the Boost duration, it is gonna be hard for you to reach your goal.

You can use the stocked power-ups inside the game any time you are in need of them. There are limits to the number of power-ups that you can store. Upgrading the powers let you use those powers for more time.

Levels:
1. Farmlands
2. Mountains 
3. Cliff 
4. Caves 
5. Woods 
6. Swamps
7. Fog
8. Graveyard

Controls: 
- Swipe upwards to jump
- Swipe downwards to slide
- Swipe twice to double jump

Notes:
-Swipe down to roll or land quickly from the air 

Features:
- Atmospheric setting
- HD graphics
- Simple controls
- 2D platform adventure game 
- New locations and obstacles throughout
- Special power-ups and upgrades 
- Challenging game play
- Rated for all ages!
